SELECT s.SALESORDERBILL_ID as SALESORDERBILL_ID, s.FBILLNO as FBILLNO , s.FDEPTID as FDEPTID,s.FDATE as FDATE,s.FSTATUS as FSTATUS,o.FTYPE as FTYPE,s.FSYNSTATUS as FSYNSTATUS from TB_SALESORDERBILL s LEFT JOIN TB_SOTEMPLATE o ON s.FTEMPID = o.SOTEMPLATE_ID where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),s.FDATE,120) = #{pd.FDATE} AND s.FTEMPID IN ( SELECT SOTEMPLATE_ID from TB_SOTEMPLATE t LEFT JOIN TB_ERP_DEP e ON t.FDEPTID = e.FITEMID WHERE SOTEMPLATE_ID in (SELECT SOTEMPLATE_ID from TB_SOTEMPPERMISSION WHERE QYWXUSER_ID IN (SELECT QYWXUSER_ID from TB_QYWXUSER WHERE USERID = #{pd.USERID})) ) GROUP BY s.FBILLNO, s.SALESORDERBILL_ID, s.FDEPTID ,s.FDATE,s.FSTATUS ,o.FTYPE ,s.FSYNSTATUS ORDER BY s.FBILLNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(FDATE) as count from TB_SALESORDERBILL where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),FDATE,120) LIKE #{pd.FDATE} +'%'
and FSTATUS = #{pd.FSTATUS}

SELECT COUNT(s.CLIENT_ID) as value,c.FNAME as name from TB_SALESORDERBILL s LEFT JOIN TB_CLIENT c ON s.CLIENT_ID = c.FITEMID where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),s.FDATE,120) LIKE #{pd.FDATE} +'%' GROUP BY s.CLIENT_ID ,c.FNAME

SELECT s.SALESORDERBILL_ID as SALESORDERBILL_ID, s.FBILLNO as FBILLNO , s.FDEPTID as FDEPTID,s.FDATE as FDATE,s.FSTATUS as FSTATUS,o.FTYPE as FTYPE,s.FSYNSTATUS as FSYNSTATUS from TB_SALESORDERBILL s LEFT JOIN TB_SOTEMPLATE o ON s.FTEMPID = o.SOTEMPLATE_ID where CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),s.FDATE,120) BETWEEN #{pd.date} AND #{pd.date1} AND s.FTEMPID IN ( SELECT SOTEMPLATE_ID from TB_SOTEMPLATE t LEFT JOIN TB_ERP_DEP e ON t.FDEPTID = e.FITEMID WHERE SOTEMPLATE_ID in (SELECT SOTEMPLATE_ID from TB_SOTEMPPERMISSION WHERE QYWXUSER_ID IN (SELECT QYWXUSER_ID from TB_QYWXUSER WHERE USERID = #{pd.USERID})) ) GROUP BY s.FBILLNO, s.SALESORDERBILL_ID, s.FDEPTID ,s.FDATE,s.FSTATUS ,o.FTYPE ,s.FSYNSTATUS ORDER BY s.FBILLNO DESC

SELECT s.SALESORDERBILL_ID as SALESORDERBILL_ID, s.FBILLNO as FBILLNO , s.FDEPTID as FDEPTID,s.FDATE as FDATE,s.FSTATUS as FSTATUS,o.FTYPE as FTYPE from TB_SALESORDERBILL s LEFT JOIN TB_SOTEMPLATE o ON s.FTEMPID = o.SOTEMPLATE_ID where s.SALESORDERBILL_ID = #{SALESORDERBILL_ID}
